bt.torrent

Interface PieceStatistics

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BitfieldBasedStatistics, UpdatablePieceStatistics

    public interface PieceStatistics
    Provides basic information about the availability of different pieces in the swarm.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getCount(int pieceIndex) 
      int getPiecesTotal() 

    • Method Detail

      • getCount

        int getCount(int pieceIndex)
        Returns:
        Total number of peers that have a given piece.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getPiecesTotal

        int getPiecesTotal()
        Returns:
        Total number of pieces in the torrent (i.e. max piece index + 1)
        Since:
        1.0
